message.body: I'm actually coming back Monday the 16th at like 330. You should meet me at the bart or cinnaholic so we can catch up(:
Just text me when I should leave for Bart and I'll be there!
Yee(: I'm stoked! I hope your break is going well!
Me too!! And it's going really well. I hope yours is too. See you in a week!
Would you possibly be down to go to coachella? My parents are getting me tix and a hotel room for my bday! April 13-15
Can I think on it a few days? Cuz how much are tickets? Idk if I can afford it yet
But thank you for inviting me, that's super awesome of your parents too!:D you're stoked!
Yeah definitely!! I'll check ticket prices and let you know, but that would be so amazing if you could come :)
Sweet, I'm checking them now then gotta talk to my parents, but I hope I can!!
Sounds good! The hotel is on me :)
Dude thats sweet, I'll have to talk to my dad. (ps you should buy yourself fix as soon as they go on sale Friday cuz they sol out in like a week last time)
Great let me know when you find out!! And thanks, I already have an account made and an alarm set for when they go on sale Friday. I hope you can go! Fee
l free to tell your dad I bought his bk if that helps, jk
Bahaha I'll be sure to:P I'll let you know what happens
